caption.p: Influenza activity in the 2019â€“2020 epidemic season.

(A) All testing samples and the number of influenza-positive samples from mid-November 2019 to mid-March 2020 in China are shown with blue and red bars. The positive rate is shown with a green line. (B) The positive rates for mainland China, southern China and northern China are shown with full lines, dashed lines and dotted lines, respectively. (For interpretation of the references to colour in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the web version of this article.)
